channel.title: I made an online BingBot for automating bing rewards points
channel.description:
I saw another one like this online, but bing auto-redirected the page out.
http://vartan.net46.net/bb/
Directions: Set the delay low enough that Bing does not have time to redirect the browser, but still allowing the searches to load.

item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

Or… $15 on top of a job is still $15 worth of shit you can buy.

item.title: I made an online BingBot for automating bing rewards points
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

I’m actually doing good with bing. I run this bot once a day, get what is essentially 50 cents (for a gold account). That’s around 15 bucks a month for no effort. Naturebucks has a good referral system, I’ve found, but it seems like none of my referrals actually did anything so that makes it worthkess

Read full topic

item.title: I made an online BingBot for automating bing rewards points
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Seems like a handy tool but I’ve never found a referral site that is actually worth the time. The amount of money you actually make off them is pathetic and really not worth the effort

The Bingbot part is neat I guess, I haven’t touched Bing since Club Live, so I’m assuming it’s similar to that?

Read full topic

Feel free to give suggestions/criticisms.
